jhelp.util.gui

Class JHelpSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.gui.JHelpSprite

  • public final class JHelpSprite
extends java.lang.Object
    A sprite, in an other word an image can be show/hide/translate easily over an other image.
    To create a sripe use JHelpImage.createSprite(int, int, int, int)
    Author:
    JHelp
